title: Hellio Messaging
description: Hellio Messaging is a Single & Bulk SMS messaging app in West Africa.

title: Jetron Ticket
description: Jetron Tickets is an event hub where anyone can discover new events, read about past events and get tickets for these events.

description: I developed a church management apllication with features such as member detail tracking, offering/tithe/contribution recording, seating assignment due to COVID-19, graphical statistics display for decision making etc.

title: Loan Management Application
description: I and a team of developers worked on an application to manage the co-operative system of a school for staffs, it included features such as staff and guarantor details management admin and staff dashboard, realtime status update and notification etc.
